# Publications {#sec-publications}

The following tables list published and grey-literature studies that have used ELCOM (and relevant derivative versions) for hydrodynamic and water quality modelling. This is not intended to be exhaustive but provides a representative overview of applications across lakes, reservoirs, estuaries, and coastal waters.
